title: The Chinese herbal prescription JZ-1 promotes extracellular vesicle production and protects against herpes simplex virus type 2 infection in vitro
content:
Publication date: 15 March 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 5

Author(s): Wenjia Wang, Ximing Jin, Qingqing Shao, Tong Liu, Tianli Liu, Xinwei Zhao, Lijun Xu, Wen Gao, Liu Hu, Zhuo Chen
